hero.title: Making the Internet
hero.subtitle: Feel Better
hero.text: For every dreamer, creator, and change-maker tired of the old internet, Web3 is here. ENS is more than a protocol – it's a commitment to a better web, built for everyone.

features.title: Your name
features.text: Your ENS name is anchored in Web3, but works across the internet. It’s your identity: simple, memorable, unmistakably yours.

hero.title: Build in good company
hero.text: Whether you're a web3 newbie or a seasoned pro, we're inviting you to help craft a brighter web. ENS is more than just a protocol—it's a movement towards a trustless internet.

hero.title:
Trusted by the
New Internet
hero.text: ENS is a community of pioneers, collectively shaping a more intuitive and trustworthy internet. It's not just about being part of Web3; it's about leading it.

hero.title: Your platform for change
hero.text: Our DAO is the lifeblood of our decentralized ethos. Designed for longevity, the DAO nurtures ENS's resilience and flexibility, evolving through a tapestry of community voices.

about.hero: ENS is an open source blockchain-based naming protocol

aboutENS.title: About ENS
aboutENS.text: Started at the Ethereum Foundation in early 2017, ENS is a public good, a basic piece of Internet infrastructure that belongs to the community. Anyone and everyone is free to interact with the protocol as they are permissionless contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.
aboutENS.support: We have received generous financial support from:
aboutENS.support2: Representatives of ENS participate in the greater Internet community:

aboutENSLabs.title: About ENS Labs Limited
aboutENSLabs.text: Founded in 2018, ENS Labs Limited is a Singapore-based non-profit organisation and is responsible for the core software development of ENS. This includes the ENS app, open source libraries and core smart contracts

benefits.title: Benefits of Ethereum
benefits.text: Though it supports a wide range of non-Ethereum assets, ENS runs on the Ethereum blockchain. This brings the benefits of decentralization, security, censorship-resistance, and programmability of the Ethereum blockchain to Internet naming, enabling new features like self-custody, composability in the greater Ethereum smart-contract ecosystem, and more.

root.title: Managing the ENS root
root.text: To facilitate the possibility of upgrades and maintenance, the ENS root is controlled by a four of seven multisig, with members of related projects as keyholders. In the long term, we would like the root multisig to be replaced by some form of distributed decision making process, as such systems become available.

constitution.title: ENS constitution book now available
constitution.description: A printed copy of the ENS constitution and its signers is now available in hardcover and ultra-limited edition of 50
